mapper.select: select * from leave_approval where user_no = #{user_no} and date_part('month', leaveapp_start) = #{month}

SELECT la.leaveapp_no, la.user_no, la.leaveapp_content, la.leaveapp_start, la.leaveapp_end, la.leaveapp_type, la.leaveapp_total, MAX(CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN u.user_name END) AS "one", MAX(CASE WHEN rn = 2 THEN u.user_name END) AS "two", la.leaveapp_status FROM ( SELECT lal.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY lal.leaveapp_no ORDER BY lal.leaveappln_order) AS rn FROM leave_approval_line lal ) lal INNER JOIN leave_approval la ON lal.leaveapp_no = la.leaveapp_no INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_no = lal.leaveappln_user_no WHERE la.user_no = #{user_no} AND la.leaveapp_status != 3 and date_part('month', leaveapp_start) = #{month} GROUP BY la.leaveapp_no, la.user_no, la.leaveapp_content, la.leaveapp_start, la.leaveapp_end, la.leaveapp_type, la.leaveapp_total, la.leaveapp_final_date, la.leaveapp_status ORDER BY la.leaveapp_no DESC
